verbose_text: 2-Fluoro-2-deoxy-glucose (2FDG), a glucose analog with reduced effects on glycosylation compared with 2DG, was similarly able to increase cell viability as well as boost Th17 cell differentiation (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY D).
evidence: glucose analog with reduced effects on glycosylation compared with 2DG              , was similarly able to increase cell viability
